## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                           | Type     | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `color`       | `color`        | passing - color                       | `string` | `''`    |
| `domId`       | `dom-id`       | DOM location of canvas element        | `string` | `''`    |
| `index`       | `index`        | index number within larger set        | `number` | `-1`    |
| `link`        | `link`         | connect animation name to a thumbnail | `string` | `''`    |
| `name`        | `name`         | passing - name                        | `string` | `''`    |
| `objectID`    | `object-i-d`   | object id within larger set           | `string` | `''`    |
| `path`        | `path`         | passing - path                        | `string` | `''`    |
| `texture`     | `texture`      | passing - texture path                | `string` | `''`    |
| `textureId`   | `texture-id`   | passing - texture unique ID           | `string` | `''`    |
| `thumbnail`   | `thumbnail`    | passing - thumbnail path              | `string` | `''`    |
| `thumbnailId` | `thumbnail-id` | passing - thumbnail unique ID         | `string` | `''`    |
